title: From Ice To Flames
description: From Ice to Flames is a steamy STAND-ALONE, second chance, friends to lovers, single dad, romantic comedy with surprising plot twists and a mix of lovable characters that will keep you laughing and turning the pages. If you like raw emotion, lots of dogs, and humor, then download this book today.One No More Men.Two years ago, Milly Fremont walked away from her marriage with nothing but heartbreak… and Dick… the one hundred sixty pound furry pooch her ex dropped off on her doorstep.Little did she know that her sexy new neighbor, veterinarian Hudson West, would turn her world upside down and have her panting and drooling like Dick.But when a jerk decided to run over her beloved pup, she couldn’t ignore Hudson's help.Soon they found themselves in a passionate fling they both had reasons to keep to one night only.Except one night turned into dozens and Milly found herself with more than she bargained for.Will her no-more-men-rule go up in flames along with her heart? Find out in this steamy romance read."A heart stirring romance with laugh out loud moments that straddles the line between sweet and sexy." Terri E. Laine, USA Today bestselling author
author: A.M. Hargrove
